leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 结构生物-功能/位点/相互作用预测生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 表征→功能/位点→相互作用→解释→benchmark
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 模型库 + 数据集 + 评测

queries: [WEB] deep learning protein function prediction github

tools.name: ProtFAD
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction model using function-aware domains
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach for protein function prediction that incorporates function-aware domains as an implicit modality to enhance prediction accuracy.

tools.name: safpred
tools.one_line_profile: Synteny-aware gene function prediction for bacteria
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting gene function in bacteria by leveraging synteny information and protein embeddings.

tools.name: FeGenie
tools.one_line_profile: HMM-based identification of iron-related genes in genomes
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics tool for the identification and categorization of iron genes and iron gene operons in genomes and metagenomes using HMMs.

tools.name: MagicLamp
tools.one_line_profile: Targeted annotation of (meta)genomic datasets using HMM sets
tools.detailed_description: A platform designed for the targeted annotation of genomic, metagenomic, and transcriptomic datasets utilizing Hidden Markov Model (HMM) sets.

tools.name: HNetGO
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction via heterogeneous network transformer
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that employs a heterogeneous network transformer for predicting protein functions.

tools.name: Watershed
tools.one_line_profile: Prioritization of functional rare genetic variants
tools.detailed_description: A model to predict the functional effects of rare genetic variants by integrating genomic annotations and RNA-seq data.

tools.name: TransFew
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based model for protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A transformer-based approach for predicting protein functions, utilizing few-shot learning principles.

tools.name: geneXtendeR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for functional annotation of ChIP-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R/Bioconductor package designed to optimize the functional annotation of ChIP-seq data by extending gene regions.

tools.name: SIFTER
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogeny-based protein function prediction pipeline
tools.detailed_description: Statistical Inference of Function Through Evolutionary Relationships (SIFTER) is a pipeline for predicting protein function based on phylogenetic information.

tools.name: SURFY2
tools.one_line_profile: Classifier for human surfaceome protein prediction
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning classifier to predict whether a human transmembrane protein is located at the cell surface or in intracellular membranes.

tools.name: FANTASIA
tools.one_line_profile: Functional annotation based on embedding space similarity
tools.detailed_description: A tool for protein functional annotation that leverages similarity in embedding spaces.

tools.name: BeProf
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for deep learning-based protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive computational benchmark framework for evaluating various deep learning approaches for protein function prediction.

tools.name: RNALoc-LM
tools.one_line_profile: RNA subcellular localization prediction using language models
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained RNA language model specifically designed to predict the subcellular localization of RNA molecules.

tools.name: SDN2GO
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model designed to predict protein functions (GO terms) from sequence data.

tools.name: LoFTK
tools.one_line_profile: Loss-of-Function ToolKit for variant prediction
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for efficient and automated prediction of Loss-of-Function (LoF) variants from genotyped and sequenced genomes.

tools.name: Prot2Text-V2
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction with multimodal contrastive alignment
tools.detailed_description: A model for protein function prediction that utilizes multimodal contrastive alignment to integrate protein information with textual descriptions.

tools.name: BRAKER
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for protein coding gene structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for fully automated prediction of protein coding gene structures in novel eukaryotic genomes using GeneMark and AUGUSTUS.

tools.name: GenomeView
tools.one_line_profile: Stand-alone genome browser and editor
tools.detailed_description: An interactive visualization tool for sequences, annotations, alignments, and syntenic mappings.

tools.name: ProtHGT
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Graph Transformer for protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A model utilizing Heterogeneous Graph Transformers (HGT) to predict protein functions by integrating biological knowledge graphs and protein language models.

tools.name: protein-localization
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based protein subcellular localization prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool using Transformer protein embeddings with linear attention mechanisms to predict the subcellular location of proteins.

tools.name: RNATracker
tools.one_line_profile: Deep RNN for mRNA subcellular localization prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep recurrent neural network model for predicting the subcellular localization of mRNA molecules.

tools.name: EPP
tools.one_line_profile: Enzyme Promiscuity Prediction using multi-label classification
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting enzyme promiscuity using hierarchy-informed multi-label classification techniques.

tools.name: TopEC
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction using structures and graph neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A deep graph neural network-based approach for predicting protein functions utilizing protein structural information.

tools.name: FASSO
tools.one_line_profile: Functional Annotations using Sequence and Structure Orthology
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating functional annotations based on sequence and structural orthology.

tools.name: xai-proteins
tools.one_line_profile: Explainable AI for protein function prediction transformers
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for gaining insights into the inner workings of transformer models used for protein function prediction.

tools.name: NodeCoder
tools.one_line_profile: Graph CNN framework for protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A general framework based on graph convolutional neural networks (GCN) for predicting protein functions.

tools.name: CLEAN-Contact
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning for enzyme functional annotation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a contrastive learning-enabled approach for enzyme functional annotation prediction incorporating structural inference.

tools.name: DETECT-v2
tools.one_line_profile: Density Estimation Tool for Enzyme Classification
tools.detailed_description: Scripts and pipeline for enzyme annotation and creation of the DETECT database using density estimation.

tools.name: Mps-mvRBRL
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-label protein subcellular localization prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accurate prediction of multi-label protein subcellular localization through multi-view feature learning and RBRL classifier.

tools.name: InterLabelGO
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction tool unraveling label correlations
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach for protein function prediction that focuses on unraveling label correlations to improve Gene Ontology (GO) term prediction accuracy.

tools.name: HRIBO
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput annotation workflow for bacterial Ribo-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A workflow to enable reproducible and high-throughput analysis of bacterial Ribo-seq data. It performs pre-processing, quality control, and outputs annotation-independent ORF predictions integrated with computed features.

tools.name: VirMake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for viral metagenomic data analysis and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based pipeline for paired-end viral metagenomic data analysis, offering taxonomic and functional annotation. It supports offline execution and HPC cluster environments.

tools.name: ProFun
tools.one_line_profile: Library of models for Protein Function prediction (CAFA5)
tools.detailed_description: A library containing models for protein function prediction, developed as part of a top-ranking solution in the CAFA5 competition.

tools.name: LipidLynxX
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for conversion and linking of lipid annotations
tools.detailed_description: Provides functionality to convert, cross-match, and link various lipid annotations to tools supporting lipid ontology, pathway, and network analysis for systems-wide integration.

tools.name: ICAnet
tools.one_line_profile: ICA-based functional module deciphering for cell clustering
tools.detailed_description: Uses Independent Component Analysis to decipher functional modules for improved cell clustering and annotation in single-cell analysis.

tools.name: DisoFLAG
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of protein intrinsic disorder and functions
tools.detailed_description: Accurate prediction of protein intrinsic disorder and its functions using a graph-based interaction protein language model.

tools.name: hpcleap_dnds
tools.one_line_profile: Sliding window dN/dS vs functional domain comparison tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool that aggregates bioinformatics information to compare selective pressures (dN/dS) acting along protein sequences against an overlay of functional protein domain annotations.

tools.name: deepSimDEF
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning models for functional analysis of genes using GO
tools.detailed_description: Offers single- and multi-channel deep learning models for functional analysis of genes using Gene Ontology annotations of gene products.

tools.name: genofan
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for functional annotation of bacterial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A workflow designed for the functional annotation of a set of bacterial genomes.

tools.name: LowNSAE
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Autoencoders for Low-N Protein Function Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Official code repository for Sparse Autoencoders designed for Low-N Protein Function Prediction and Design.

tools.name: distillR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for distilling functional annotations of microbial genomes
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for distilling functional annotations of bacterial genomes and metagenomes.

tools.name: Batch-Fasta-Interpro
tools.one_line_profile: Batch InterProScan wrapper for multi-sequence fasta files
tools.detailed_description: A tool to run InterProScan on a multi-sequence fasta file via EBI webservices, facilitating batch functional annotation.

tools.name: deepgoplus
tools.one_line_profile: DeepGO protein function prediction with GOPlus axioms
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning based method for protein function prediction that incorporates GOPlus axioms for improved accuracy.

tools.name: predCAN
tools.one_line_profile: Ontology-based prediction of cancer driver genes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the ontology-based prediction of cancer driver genes.

tools.name: micronota
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation pipeline for microbial genomes and metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: An annotation pipeline designed for microbial genomes and metagenomes, facilitating functional and taxonomic analysis.

tools.name: Metagenomic-DeepFRI
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for DeepFRI-based metagenomic protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for searching and aligning contact maps for proteins and running DeepFri's Graph Convolutional Network (GCN) for function prediction in metagenomic data.

tools.name: Sfcnn
tools.one_line_profile: 3D CNN scoring function for protein-ligand binding affinity
tools.detailed_description: A scoring function model based on 3D convolutional neural networks for predicting protein-ligand binding affinity.

tools.name: SPROF-GO
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence-based protein function prediction using language models
tools.detailed_description: Fast and accurate protein function prediction from sequence through pretrained language models and homology-based label diffusion.

tools.name: CHAP
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for the functional annotation of ion channel structures
tools.detailed_description: CHAP is a tool designed for the functional annotation of ion channel structures, likely analyzing pore dimensions and hydrophobicity profiles to infer functional properties.

tools.name: Jannovar
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation of VCF variants with functional impact and database information
tools.detailed_description: Jannovar is a Java-based tool and library for functionally annotating VCF variants, predicting their impact on transcripts and proteins, and linking them to database records.

tools.name: ProDAR
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamics-informed protein function prediction using Dynamically Activated Residues
tools.detailed_description: ProDAR (Protein Dynamically Activated Residues) is a PyTorch implementation for protein function prediction and annotation that incorporates protein dynamics information.

tools.name: nf-ncov-voc
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for SARS-CoV-2 mutation profiling and functional annotation
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for generating mutation profiles of SARS-CoV-2 or Mpox genomes, integrated with VIRUS-MVP for visualization and functional annotation of variants.

tools.name: EukMetaSanity
tools.one_line_profile: Structural and functional annotation pipeline for eukaryotic MAGs
tools.detailed_description: EukMetaSanity is a pipeline designed for the structural and functional annotation of eukaryotic metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: CellFunTopic
tools.one_line_profile: Functional Annotation for Single-Cell Transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: CellFunTopic is a tool for functional annotation of single-cell transcriptomics data, likely using topic modeling or similar approaches to infer cellular functions.

tools.name: LncADeep
tools.one_line_profile: Ab initio lncRNA identification and functional annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: LncADeep is a deep learning-based tool for the ab initio identification of long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs) and their functional annotation.

tools.name: euryale
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for taxonomic classification and functional annotation of metagenomic reads
tools.detailed_description: Euryale is a Nextflow pipeline based on MEDUSA for the taxonomic classification and functional annotation of metagenomic sequencing reads.

tools.name: IPRStats
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical analysis and visualization tool for InterProScan results
tools.detailed_description: IPRStats is a tool to facilitate the analysis of InterProScan results by generating statistical charts and tables, aiding in the interpretation of protein functional annotations.

tools.name: UNIFAN
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised cell functional annotation for single-cell RNA-Seq
tools.detailed_description: UNIFAN is a tool for unsupervised functional annotation of cells based on single-cell RNA sequencing data.

tools.name: DM3Loc
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-label mRNA subcellular localization prediction using deep learning
tools.detailed_description: DM3Loc is a deep learning framework utilizing multi-head self-attention for predicting multi-label mRNA subcellular localization, a key aspect of functional annotation.

tools.name: InterProScan
tools.one_line_profile: Genome-scale protein function classification tool
tools.detailed_description: InterProScan is a widely used software package that scans protein sequences against the InterPro member databases to classify proteins into families and predict domains and important sites.

tools.name: InterProScan 6
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow-based genome-scale protein function classification
tools.detailed_description: InterProScan 6 is the Nextflow-based implementation of the InterProScan tool for scalable genome-wide protein function classification.

tools.name: pepfeature
tools.one_line_profile: Feature calculation library for protein sequences focused on epitope prediction
tools.detailed_description: pepfeature is a Python package for calculating features from protein sequences, specifically tailored for epitope prediction tasks.

tools.name: eggnog-mapper
tools.one_line_profile: Fast genome-wide functional annotation through orthology assignment
tools.detailed_description: eggnog-mapper is a tool for fast functional annotation of novel sequences using precomputed orthology assignments from the eggNOG database.

tools.name: GO FEAT
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based functional annotation tool for genomic and transcriptomic data
tools.detailed_description: GO FEAT is a rapid, web-based tool designed for the functional annotation of genomic and transcriptomic datasets.

tools.name: DeepFRI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for functional residue identification in proteins
tools.detailed_description: DeepFRI is a Graph Convolutional Network-based method for predicting protein function and identifying functionally important residues using sequence and structure information.

tools.name: metascan
tools.one_line_profile: Metabolic scanning and annotation of metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: Metascan is a tool for the metabolic scanning and functional annotation of metagenomic datasets.

tools.name: GeneSCF
tools.one_line_profile: Gene Set Clustering based on Functional annotation
tools.detailed_description: GeneSCF is a command-line tool for clustering gene sets based on functional annotations, facilitating enrichment analysis.

tools.name: DualNetGO
tools.one_line_profile: Dual Network Model for Protein Function Prediction
tools.detailed_description: DualNetGO is a deep learning model that utilizes a dual network architecture for effective feature selection and protein function prediction.

tools.name: ALOFT
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation of Loss-of-Function Transcripts
tools.detailed_description: ALOFT provides extensive functional annotations for predicted loss-of-function (LoF) variants in the human genome to distinguish true LoF from benign variants.

tools.name: proteinfer
tools.one_line_profile: Deep neural networks for protein functional inference
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach to predict protein function directly from amino acid sequences, utilizing convolutional neural networks to infer Gene Ontology (GO) terms.

tools.name: FA-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Functional annotation pipeline for non-model organisms
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for the functional annotation of proteins from non-model organisms, integrating various bioinformatics tools for comprehensive analysis.

tools.name: geneidx
tools.one_line_profile: Genome annotation pipeline for protein-coding genes
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based pipeline for automating the annotation of protein-coding genes in genomes, facilitating reproducible genomic analysis.

tools.name: hypro
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to extend hypothetical protein annotations
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to improve Prokka annotations by extending hypothetical protein descriptions using additional homology searches against larger databases.

tools.name: KEGGaNOG
tools.one_line_profile: Mining KEGG pathways completeness from eggNOG-mapper
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool for analyzing and mining KEGG pathway completeness data derived from eggNOG-mapper functional annotations.

tools.name: TransFun
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based deep learning model for predicting protein functions (GO terms) from sequences, developed by the Jianlin Cheng lab.

tools.name: JCVI_HMP_metagenomic_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic functional annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: The functional annotation pipeline used by the J. Craig Venter Institute for the Human Microbiome Project (HMP) metagenomic data analysis.

tools.name: CARE
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for enzyme classification and retrieval
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate methods for the classification and retrieval of enzymes, facilitating the development of protein function prediction models.

tools.name: viral-protein-function-plm
tools.one_line_profile: Viral protein function prediction using PLMs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting the function of viral protein families leveraging protein language models (PLMs) to capture sequence semantics.

tools.name: functional-annotation
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-omics functional annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the functional annotation of genomes that integrates data from RNA-seq, ChIP-seq, and DNase-seq experiments.

tools.name: DeepPurpose
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for drug discovery and protein function
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive deep learning toolkit for Drug-Target Interaction (DTI) prediction, compound property prediction, and protein function prediction.

tools.name: GO2Sum
tools.one_line_profile: Summarizer for GO term annotations
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool that generates human-readable summaries for Gene Ontology (GO) term annotations produced by protein function prediction methods.

tools.name: ECRECer
tools.one_line_profile: Enzyme Commission number prediction framework
tools.detailed_description: A dual-core multi-agent learning framework designed for the accurate prediction of Enzyme Commission (EC) numbers from protein sequences.

tools.name: orthomap
tools.one_line_profile: Extract orthologous maps and evolutionary ages
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to extract orthologous maps and calculate evolutionary ages (transcriptome evolutionary index) from OrthoFinder or eggNOG results.

tools.name: GCV
tools.one_line_profile: Genome Context Viewer for synteny and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A web-based visualization platform for federating genomes and exploring synteny derived from functional annotations.

tools.name: LoReAn
tools.one_line_profile: Long Read Annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: An automated annotation pipeline for eukaryotic genomes that leverages long-read sequencing data (PacBio/Nanopore) for improved gene structure prediction.

tools.name: PenLight
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning for protein representation
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network-based method utilizing contrastive learning to generate protein representations for structural and functional annotation tasks.

tools.name: go-kriging
tools.one_line_profile: Geospatial prediction via ordinary kriging
tools.detailed_description: A Golang library for performing ordinary kriging, a geostatistical interpolation method used for geospatial prediction and mapping.

tools.name: Struct2GO
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A protein function prediction method that integrates AlphaFold2 structural information with sequence data using a graph pooling algorithm.

tools.name: ATLAS
tools.one_line_profile: User-friendly metagenome analysis workflow for assembly, binning, and annotation
tools.detailed_description: ATLAS is a workflow for the assembly, binning, and annotation of metagenomic data. It handles quality control, assembly, genome binning, and taxonomic/functional annotation, designed for ease of use with three main commands.

tools.name: epilogos
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for summarizing and visualizing multi-biosample functional genomic annotations
tools.detailed_description: Epilogos provides methods to summarize and visualize functional genomic annotations across multiple biosamples. It models chromatin states and other functional annotations to produce comprehensive visualizations of genomic regions.

tools.name: mg_annotation
tools.one_line_profile: NMDC Metagenome Annotation Workflow
tools.detailed_description: The NMDC Metagenome Annotation Workflow is a pipeline for the structural and functional annotation of metagenomic contigs. It identifies genes and assigns functional predictions using various databases.

tools.name: ProtNote
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal deep learning model for protein function prediction using text and sequences
tools.detailed_description: ProtNote is a multimodal deep learning model that leverages free-form text descriptions alongside protein sequences to enable both supervised and zero-shot protein function prediction.

tools.name: PGAP
tools.one_line_profile: NCBI Prokaryotic Genome Annotation Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: PGAP (Prokaryotic Genome Annotation Pipeline) is the standard pipeline used by NCBI to annotate bacterial and archaeal genomes. It predicts protein-coding genes, rRNAs, tRNAs, and other non-coding RNAs.

tools.name: nf-core/mag
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenome Assembly and Binning Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: nf-core/mag is a bioinformatics pipeline for the assembly, binning, and quality control of metagenomic data. It supports both short-read and long-read data processing.

tools.name: nf-core/proteinannotator
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for functional annotation of proteins from FASTA sequences
tools.detailed_description: nf-core/proteinannotator is a pipeline designed to perform functional annotation on protein sequences provided in FASTA format, utilizing various databases and tools to predict protein function.

tools.name: FFPredGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction using GAN-generated synthetic features
tools.detailed_description: FFPredGAN improves protein function prediction by using Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to create synthetic feature samples, enhancing the training of prediction models.

tools.name: STRING2GO
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction from PPI networks using deep learning
tools.detailed_description: STRING2GO predicts protein function (Gene Ontology terms) based on protein-protein interaction network topology using deep maxout neural networks.

tools.name: MetaboAnnotation
tools.one_line_profile: R package for high-level metabolomics data annotation
tools.detailed_description: MetaboAnnotation provides high-level functionality to support and simplify the annotation of metabolomics data, facilitating the matching of spectral data to reference libraries.

tools.name: VAE_protein_function
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction using Variational Autoencoders
tools.detailed_description: This tool implements a Variational Autoencoder (VAE) to learn representations of protein sequences for the purpose of function prediction and sequence generation.

tools.name: gff3toembl
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for Prokka GFF3 files to EMBL format
tools.detailed_description: gff3toembl is a utility to convert GFF3 annotation files generated by Prokka into EMBL format, facilitating the submission of annotated assemblies to databases like EBI.

tools.name: shotmap
tools.one_line_profile: Shotgun Metagenome Annotation Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: Shotmap is a pipeline for the annotation of shotgun metagenomic data, allowing for the functional characterization of microbiome samples.

tools.name: EnzyNet
tools.one_line_profile: Enzyme classification using 3D CNNs on spatial representations
tools.detailed_description: EnzyNet is a deep learning tool that classifies enzymes based on their 3D structure using 3D Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) applied to spatial representations of proteins.

tools.name: goatools
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for handling Gene Ontology (GO) terms and enrichment analysis
tools.detailed_description: goatools is a Python library for processing Gene Ontology (GO) terms. It allows for reading OBO files, traversing the GO graph, and performing GO enrichment analyses.

tools.name: annotateMaf
tools.one_line_profile: R package to add functional variant annotation to MAF files
tools.detailed_description: annotateMaf is an R package designed to annotate Mutation Annotation Format (MAF) files with functional variant information, aiding in the interpretation of cancer genomics data.

tools.name: DeepLoc-2.0
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-label subcellular localization prediction using protein foundation models
tools.detailed_description: DeepLoc 2.0 predicts the subcellular localization of proteins. It uses a pre-trained protein language model (ESM) and supports multi-label predictions and sorting signal identification.

tools.name: EcoFoldDB
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for structure-guided functional annotation of metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A database and pipeline that utilizes protein structure prediction to guide the annotation of ecologically relevant functions at the metagenome scale.

tools.name: PGPg_finder
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for annotating Plant-Growth Promotion Genes
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool offering workflows for genome and metagenome annotation specifically targeting Plant-Growth Promotion Genes (PGPg).

tools.name: Prokka
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid software tool to annotate prokaryotic genomes
tools.detailed_description: A software tool to rapidly annotate prokaryotic genomes, producing GFF3, GBK, and other standard output formats.

tools.name: CLEAN
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning model for enzyme function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A contrastive learning framework (Contrastive Learning-enabled Enzyme Annotation) for high-quality functional prediction of proteins, specifically enzymes.

tools.name: netGO
tools.one_line_profile: R package for network-integrated pathway enrichment analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R/Shiny package designed for pathway enrichment analysis that integrates network information to improve functional interpretation.

tools.name: ProMEP
tools.one_line_profile: Zero-shot prediction of mutation effects on protein function
tools.detailed_description: A multimodal deep representation learning method for zero-shot prediction of mutation effects on protein function.

tools.name: Graph2GO
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based representation learning for protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A graph-based representation learning method designed for predicting protein functions using Gene Ontology (GO) terms.

tools.name: DeepGraphGO
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network for multispecies protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network-based approach for large-scale, multispecies protein function prediction.
